title: Is We Dumb? | Happy Ending. Runaway. Stop Sign. Gas Leak.
description:
Remember that time you and your friend ran away from home, drove for 10 hours, and somehow only ended up 3 hours away from home? hahaha... kids. Let's talk about that, the scariest stop sign in human history, having to get a mugshot with semen on your face, slipping in your spouse's vomit, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/k7Z-c4PCa_Q

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com

author: dan@dancummins.tv (Dan Cummins)
